title: Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices: Clothing Materials for Euro area (17 countries) (DISCONTINUED)
notes:
The Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices category "Clothing Materials (03.1.1)" is a classification of semi-durable goods that includes clothing materials of natural fibers, of man-made fibers, and of their mixtures.

This category excludes furnishing fabrics (05.2.0).

This is a subcategory of the Clothing and Footwear (03) and of the Clothing (03.1) categories.

Information provided in the notes pertaining to HICP classifications can be found from the source at: http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/cache/metadata/en/prc_hicp_esms.htm.
